records.summary: Dark sky, cylinder with light and clouds in it swirling around.
records.story: Dark sky, Cylinder with light and clouds in it swirling around. December 12, 2016.  This happened on the evening of June 12th or the 13th of 2016. I was walking up my outside stairs headed south, my home blocks the west side area until I am all the way up the stairs. this was in the evening time I dont know the time, but it was dark. I was in about the middle of the stairs, I turned up and was facing south, suddenly I saw what to me was a huge cylinder of light with white like clouds whirling around in it as it came across the sky  it was light in it like day and inside swirilling fast.  I say the cylinder was about a 50 degree angle when it came from the West, I never saw the tail end. what puzzles me the most was that the light came across like an unfolding light, it had an end to the light in the front, I never saw the end of a flashlights that was pointed in the sky, it shot across so fast, maybe I saw it for about 4 to 5 seconds, it had stopped and it was just there, then in the blink of an eye the lights just closed and dissapered, dark sky and nothing more.  it was gone and dark again. I estimated that the cylinder (I call it a cylinder because it was round ) to be maybe a mile away, but in my mind it was closer than that, not really sure. I would say for comparison the cylinder was about as wide and as round as a Train engine or a box car from a train., but it was round. from the ground level I was at.

records.summary: I was doing a patrol of my buildings perimeter on 06/15/17 around 10:03AM. I always tend to look at the sky and today I was lucky enoug
records.story: I was doing a patrol of my buildings perimeter on 06/15/17 around 10:03AM.  I always tend to look at the sky, and today I was lucky enough to witness about 50 sphere shaped objects flying in formation in the Denver sky.   At first I thought it was just a flock birds, but then this plane passed right by the objects and that's when I knew they couldn't be birds.  Reasons being, as soon as the plane passed by these objects got so close to each other creating like a wall and quickly moved out the way of the plane.   During this time the objects also change from their white color to a black color as if they felt in danger by the plane.   After the plane was out the frame these object continued to fly in abnormal directions in the sky.  I filmed them for about a minute and half before they finally just fanished into thin air.   The crazy thing is I saw two objects similar to these object about 4 days ago and also filmed it.  I dont know what they are but when I zoomed in to the objects they definitely weren't anything I have ever seen.  They were round with like two long black I guess poles at the top and bottom of the objects.   After everything happened.  I went back inside my building and for some reason I felt really angry and agitated.  I felt this way for about 5 minutes.   I hope I can spot some more UFOs in the future.

records.summary: Pink flying object that disappeared into clouds
records.story: Pink flying object that disappeared into clouds I have an old dog who wakes me up to go potty at all hours of the night.  She woke me up at 2:30 on the morning of October 31 and we went outside to my backyard.  I live in the approach zones for DIA so I see many aircraft flying overhead with their landing lights on for their approach to the airport.  There are 3 safety approach zones for the airport for all but police and emergency aircraft, usually helicopters.  One goes west to east, another goes south to north and the last fro southwest to the northeast. As I was sitting watching my dog I notice an unusual aircraft flying out of the normal safety zones.  I was flying way north of the west to east zone and perpendicular to the south to north zone; crossing the southwest to northeast zone.  Next its "landing lights" were pink, not white or yellow.  It also did not have any navigation lights flashing.  The craft was moving rather slowly then came to a complete stop for about a minute or longer.  Then it started moving again.  It disappeared into the clouds.  The entire time there was not a sound of any kind made not even my dog.

records.summary: 8 Translucent Spheres w/ Cloud Texture.
records.story: 8 Translucent Spheres w/ Cloud Texture At 1:38pm, on Friday, September 29th, 2017, I saw a number of translucent spheres flying below me, as we were 1 minute into our initial ascent above DIA. If you have a guess as to what these UFOs were, then I would love to hear from you.  The objects were as follows:  •8 perfectly spherical objects •Translucent with "soft" edges, unlike the defined edges of a balloon.  They appeared to have the exact same texture as the surrounding clouds. •6-12 ft in diameter and all the same size  •Appeared stationary, but possibly moving at low speed •Each maintained a distance of about 3x their own diameter from the next object  •Arranged in no particular order or on a particular plane

Driving down 285 west of Santa Fe, there was what appeared to be a bright planet or star in the sky off in the West.  Driving farther west, object began dropping slowly, (almost like a falling star) closer to the ground becoming brighter.   When crossing over Federal, I drove right under the object, it had a bright light and was flashing red on the sides. It was in the shape of an upside down teardrop with circles around the top.  Object disappeared after driving under it.   After the experience, I felt extremely uneasy and eyesight was affected right after.  Almost like I came across a very powerful energy.

records.summary: A cluster of whitish balls with blue chevron wings over Denver Colorado
records.story: A cluster of whitish balls with blue chevron wings over Denver Colorado We were diving from the store, when we noticed what looked like a cluster of balloons floating north.  Approximately 15 to 20 of them.  I pointed it out to my wife and daughter.  Then we noticed they were swirling in circles.  We thought they might be birds.  I thought they might have caught a air current and were playing.  But we noticed they looked like dull whitish balls with blue chevron wings.  Still, I figured they might be birds.  My wife took out her phone to video tape it, but they vanished.   We were near our home so when we got there we got out and looked for them.  I found 4 of them so I took out my phone to video tape then.  When I pointed my phone at them my phone started making a grinding sound.  Even my daughter asked me what was my phone doing. I didn't know as I've never seen my phone do that.   When I looked up to locate them, there was only 1 left and I watched it move northwest and then disappear.

records.summary: Strange colored lights blinking and moving erratically in south Denver sky.
records.story: Strange colored lights blinking and moving erratically in south Denver sky. I first noticed 2 distinctive lights.  one red and one green.  The red light was in the upper left and the green light was to the bottom right.   The lights were solid, then they began to blink.  Both started blinking in a pattern that was frequent in wavelength like that of a plane, but then they started blinking independently instead of at the same time.  Then the green light went out and the red light started moving up and down erratically and very precisely.   Then the green light came back on and blinked very erratically and the red went off.  It then flew overhead at incredible speed from the north sky to the south sky and descended out of view.  When it flew overhead, it was pure silence.   My friend who also saw it accounts that he saw blue and white lights too.  He was certain he saw them, but I am certain I did not.  We both watched very intently.  No craft was actually seen, only two lights.

records.summary: Sighting of distant object moving at high speed exhibiting ability to almost instantly "jump" ahead and laterally.
records.story: Sighting of distant object moving at high speed exhibiting ability to almost instantly "jump" ahead and laterally. On 04/03/2018, at approximately 06:00, I observed a fast-moving object at apparently very high altitude, moving from North to South.  It crossed between the two stars in Ursa Major that point towards Polaris and Polaris itself, somewhat closer to Polaris.  Object appeared to be at significantly greater altitude than commercial airliners, though possibly attainable by military aircraft.  It reminded me somewhat of early satellites which did not follow the earth's rotation in terms of brightness, but speed was greater.  The object was too distant to determine size or shape.  The sky was cloudless and dark. What caught my attention was that it appeared to consistently move at what I surmised to be several times the speed of sound, yet several times instantly “jump ahead” some distance.  Distance “jumped” was hard to estimate due to altitude, but I would say in the tens of miles each time.  Twice, the object “jumped” laterally as well, though I would estimate a shorter distance.   I followed the object until it passed the treeline at my house.

records.summary: I saw a UFO in the sky while I was on an airplane
records.story: I saw a UFO in the sky while I was on an airplane On August 18th, 2018 I was on an airplane flying from North Carolina to Los Angeles.  When we were passing Denver, Colorado, (or close to Denver, according to the airplane map), I opened my window and saw that there was a thunderstorm a couple of miles away.  I was sitting on the left side of the plane in the window seat, and the storm was directly in front of my window.  I pulled out my phone to take a video of the lightning because I thought it looked pretty cool from how high up we were.  While I was filming, I noticed a flashing red and white light flying.  It was flying the opposite direction of the plane I was in.  The object was flying in a straight line, and then it started to lower, stopped blinking for a second, and then when it started blinking again, it was up high again as if it had reversed.  It then kept flying away.  It looked almost like a drone, but because of how high up we were, there’s no way it was a drone or a building light, etc.  I also thought it could’ve been! a plane, but because of how quickly it moved, I didn’t think it could be that either.  I think I would of been able to see the outline of the plane if that had been what it was also.  It was very small and I didn’t see it’s shape because of how dark it was.  I caught it all on video though and it still confuses me.

records.story: A cluster of lights moving quickly in my video from right to left at 4 seconds in my video. The questionable object was flying from my left to right and I was following it with my phone.  However, when I showed my wife the video upon my return to Dallas, she noticed a flash that went from right to left at the 4 second spot of the 15 second video.  I slowed it down and it looks like a cluster of lights in a circular pattern.  I will submit the video following this submission, but I can't figure out what it is. records.story: I WAS WAITING FOR THE BUS AT 9TH AND GRAPE AFTER THE BOY SCOUT MEETING.  I LOOKED AND THE CRAFT FLEW EAST TO WEST OVER THE PALMER SCHOOL.  IT CHANGED COLORS FROM BLUE TO ORANGE.

records.summary: Cigar, no wings, tail, or lights moving from south to north.
records.story: Cigar, no wings, tail, or lights moving from south to north. Went out in the morning and looked east to see a large fuselage (cigar) no wings, no tail, no blinking lights.  Airplanes should still have lights on at that time.  Watched it move from south to north for several seconds, wishing I had my phone.  It went through a cloud and was never seen again.

records.summary: Clear objects with flashing lights over Carson Elementary school.
records.story: Clear objects with flashing lights over Carson Elementary school. Looking east from playground at Carson Elementary School. Dark, stormy cloud cover made the objects more obvious.  Could not tell shape.  Approximately 8-10 objects appeared to be clear blades with flashing white lights (one or two each?) flying at varying speeds and heights.  No sounds; variety of movements and groupings.  Tried to take pictures but too far away and too small. There were other people on the playground with me, but I did not think fast enough to ask if they saw them.

records.summary: This was over Empower Field. Three lights quickly changing formation in several different sequences
records.story: This was over Empower Field.  Three lights quickly changing formation in several different sequences

records.summary: I saw a large triangular shaped craft with no engine sound, no lights, no exhaust trail, cloaking against the night sky over Denver.
records.story: I saw a large triangular shaped craft with no engine sound, no lights, no exhaust trail, cloaking against the night sky over Denver. At approximately 8:30 PM on 10/8/19 I went out on my east-facing balcony to get some fresh air.  Beautiful clear starlit night.  I looked up and to my amazement I saw a triangular shaped black craft gliding silently coming from the north and heading south about 5,000 feet up.  There was no sound, no lights and no visible exhaust trail.  My eyes were fixated on it.  It appeared to be cloaked and blended into the night sky, but because it was moving, I could see its shape as it blocked out the stars.  I am estimating that it was less then a mile away and it appeared to be large in size.

records.summary: I saw what looked to be a shooting star, however it was too low to be one. It was probably flying at the same altitude as a plane maybe
records.story: I saw what looked to be a shooting star, however it was too low to be one. It was probably flying at the same altitude as a plane maybe lower. It was a bright light with a blueish hue, that appeared then disappeared in a matter of seconds.

records.summary: Unnatural movment of craft over denver - Possible UFO
records.story: Unnatural movment of craft over denver - Possible UFO An unknown, eerie orange light, comparable to aircraft headlights, but much brighter, streaking across the view from my back yard. The light then disappeared- and turned into blinking red and blue lights. The "craft" then moved from one side of the horizon to the other, with acceleration that modern science deems impossible for aircraft. The "craft" then moved unnaturally, perfoming an unnatural loop in the sky, raising 1000 or more feet almost instantly. The "craft" then looked as if it was "shaking" bouncing around in an area of the sky. Then within 10 seconds, the "craft" lights were slowly disappearing from ny view, until they were gone.

records.summary: Going North on Sante Fe to Evans when I saw a bright colorful light in the sky. It was going West and flashed 3 times slowly.
records.story: Going North on Sante Fe to Evans when I saw a bright colorful light in the sky. It was going West and flashed 3 times slowly while moving along the sky.  After the third flash, it disappeared into the sky.  At first, I thought it behind some clouds because of the way it disappeared but realized it was a clear sky after I let it sink in.

records.summary: Several massive fireballs appearing and reappearing in different #s, 2 to 4 to 3.  No apparent formation or shape.
records.story: Several massive fireballs disappearing and reappearing in different #s, 2 to 4 to 3.  No apparent formation or shape, would reappear in a different spots sometimes, but still close to each other.  My GF and I were walking to meet friends and we both saw them.
